_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Reasons for being devoted to the ascetic: When you hear the ascetic Gotama’s teaching, you’re not attracted to the doctrines of the various ascetics and brahmins.
When you hear the ascetic Gotama’s teaching, you get a sense of uplift, a confidence of the heart.
When you hear the ascetic Gotama’s teaching, you become filled with joy and happiness.
When you hear the ascetic Gotama’s teaching, you make an end of sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
When you hear the ascetic Gotama’s teaching, all your stress, weariness, and exhaustion die down.
Homage to the Blessed One [an5.194:12.4]: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
